網

Верёвка, канат; основы

Мнемоника

Главная нить 糸 как основа рыболовной сети 罔.

Варианты

purpleculture_examples:

purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 罔 [ wǎng ] none; to deceive; to slander
heisig_chinese_memo: Spiderman traps The Rhino under the hood of his famous netting, where even Rhino's horns can not break free, in fact if the netting did not dissappear after a few hours then Rhino might even perish in there.
heisig_constituent: netting, thread, spiderman, glass jar, hood, horns, one, deceased, perish, top hat, fishhook
heisig_story: Thread . . . glass canopy . . . animal horns . . . perish.
koohiiStory1: Spiderman traps The Rhino under the hood of his famous netting, where even Rhino´s horns can not break free, in fact if the netting did not dissappear after a few hours then Rhino might even perish in there.
koohiiStory2: You use a 糸 to make a net shaped like a hood. A stray animal got caught in it by its horns and perished.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You have a thread hill, but the hill is a bit weird looking (take a look at the hill radical in this kanji). It's not any normal hill, it's a weird lumpy hill that isn't quite right. That's because it is a thread hill of netting, and parts of the nets have caught things, like fish and cats, so there's weird abnormal lumps in them.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You'll need to differentiate this from 綱, which uses the same radicals (though 綱 has a real hill radical). Just remember that the weird "hill" has stuff caught in it because it is netting.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: There's so much netting that it's out of control. You decide to take your lawn mower to mow (もう) it all down.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: When you do this, it destroys your lawn mower, because who thought it was a good idea to use a lawn mower on netting? Your dumb idea. C'mon!
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 綱 (つな、コウ трос).
Ru_Radicals: 并, 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 亡 (покойный), 糸 (нить)
Ru_trainchinese: wǎng: (сущ/глаг) сеть, сетка; предмет в форме сетки; Сеть, Интернет; сеть, система; покрывать сетью; ловить сетью
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you use thread (糸) or a net (罔) to make a mesh
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Wolverine is twice as smart as before.  He figured out how to make nets by slashing up glass covers.
humanum_full_description_en:
" Net " from "糸" from "罔", "罔" is also a sound symbol. The word " net " in the Jiajin inscription is originally made " net ", followed by " death " as the sound symbol, making "罔"; and "糸" as the meaning symbol, making " net ". " Net ", "罔", and " Net " all mean hunting nets.

According to ancient history, Chengtang, the founding monarch of the Shang Dynasty, once went on a trip. He saw a hunter spread out all sides of the net and said, "The whole world is in my net." Cheng Tang said, "In this way, everything is taken away. Now.” So he ordered the hunter to put away three sides of the net and only opened one side of the net to hunt. After hearing this, the princes praised the virtues of Chengtang, and kindness is more than beasts. Later, "opening the net on three sides" was a metaphor for generosity and kindness. It is also called "open the net", which means that people who make mistakes are treated leniently.
humanum_short_description_en: " Network " from " Shito ", " neglect " is also sound, is " net newcomer word" in this for " network " as the network-shaped, braided rope into birds or fishing tools, said see " Net ".
humanum_full_description:
「網」從「糸」從「罔」，「罔」亦是聲符。甲金文「網」字本作「网」，後加「亡」為聲符，作「罔」；又加「糸」為意符，作「網」。「网」、「罔」、「網」皆表示捕獵用的網。

　　古史記載，商朝的開國君主成湯有一次出行，看見獵人把網的四面都張開之後說道：「天下四方，皆入我的網中。」成湯說：「這樣萬物都被取盡了。」於是命令獵人收起網的三面，只打開網的一面來捕獵。諸侯聽到了之後，頌揚成湯的德行，恩德及於禽獸。後來「網開三面」比喻寬大仁厚，恩澤遍施。又作「網開一面」，指對犯錯的人從寬處置。
humanum_short_description: 「網」從「糸」，「罔」亦聲，是「网」的後起字，本作「网」，象網形，表示用繩編織成的捕魚或鳥獸的工具，參見「网」。

网网 		䋄 䋞 𦂴 𦁒 net, web, network

(Simplified: 网)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 罔 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 罔 [ wǎng ] none; to deceive; to slander
①用繩、線等結成的捕魚捉鳥的器具：魚網。網羅。網開一面(喻用寬大的態度來對待)。網漏吞舟(喻法令太寬，使壞人漏網)。
②形狀像網的東西：電網。髮網。
③像網一樣的縱橫交錯的組織或系統：網點。通信網。天羅地網。
④用網捕捉：網到一條大魚。
⑤像網似的籠罩着：眼睛裏網着紅絲。

網(あみ): net, network
「 網 」從「 糸 」從「 罔 」，「 罔 」亦是聲符。甲金文「 網 」字本作「 网 」，後加「 亡 」為聲符，作「 罔 」；又加「 糸 」為意符，作「 網 」。「 网 」、「 罔 」、「 網 」皆表示捕獵用的網。 古史記載，商朝的開國君主成湯有一次出行，看見獵人把網的四面都張開之後說道：「天下四方，皆入我的網中。」成湯說：「這樣萬物都被取盡了。」於是命令獵人收起網的三面，只打開網的一面來捕獵。諸侯聽到了之後，頌揚成湯的德行，恩德及於禽獸。後來「網開三面」比喻寬大仁厚，恩澤遍施。又作「網開一面」，指對犯錯的人從寬處置。
" Net" from " 糸" from " 罔", " 罔" is also a sound symbol. The word " net" in the Jiajin inscription is originally made " net", followed by " death" as the sound symbol, making " 罔"; and " 糸" as the meaning symbol, making " net". " Net", " 罔", and " Net" all mean hunting nets. According to ancient history, Chengtang, the founding monarch of the Shang Dynasty, once went on a trip. He saw a hunter spread out all sides of the net and said, "The whole world is in my net." Cheng Tang said, "In this way, everything is taken away. Now.” So he ordered the hunter to put away three sides of the net and only opened one side of the net to hunt. After hearing this, the princes praised the virtues of Chengtang, and kindness is more than beasts. Later, "opening the net on three sides" was a metaphor for generosity and kindness. It is also called "open the net", which means that people who make mistakes are treated leniently.

網字的基本解释

網
wǎng
见“网”。

網字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wǎng］
亦作“1”。
(1)用绳线等结成的捕鱼或捉鸟兽的用具。
(2)指网状物。
(3)用网捕捉。
(4)比喻笼罩。
(5)比喻法律。
(6)指周密的组织或系統。
(7)见“網羅”。

網字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　網； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页928第01
【廣韻】文兩切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】文紡切，?音罔。【說文】本作网。或作?，隷省作㒺。今文从糸作綱。【易·繫辭】作結繩而爲㒺罟，以佃以漁。【朱子·本義】㒺，與綱同。【書·盤庚】若綱在綱。【詩·邶風】魚綱之設。　又【楚辭·招魂】綱戸朱綴。【註】綱戸，綺文縷也。

網字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

暂无。

network
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wǎng］
Also known as "1".
(1) Tools for fishing or catching birds and beasts formed with ropes, etc.
(2) Refers to the mesh.
(3) Use the net to capture.
(4) The metaphor is shrouded.
(5) Metaphor of law.
(6) Refers to a thorough organization or system.
(7) See "Snare".

This article is made from Shitou. 【Yi·Cici】As a knotted rope, it is 㒺罟, with tenants to fish. 【Zhuzi·The original meaning】㒺, same as the outline. [Book·Pangeng] If the outline is in the outline. 【Poetry·Bei Feng】The design of fish outline.　[Songs of the Chu · Soul Recalling] Tsunado Zhuzhu. [Note] Tsunato, Qiwen also.

wǎng
вм. 网
Radicals: 糸, 岡  (thread, hill)
Meaning Mnemonic
You have a thread hill, but the hill is a bit weird looking (take a look at the hill radical in this kanji). It's not any normal hill, it's a weird lumpy hill that isn't quite right. That's because it is a thread hill of netting, and parts of the nets have caught things, like fish and cats, so there's weird abnormal lumps in them.
You'll need to differentiate this from 綱, which uses the same radicals (though 綱 has a real hill radical). Just remember that the weird "hill" has stuff caught in it because it is netting.
Reading Mnemonic
There's so much netting that it's out of control. You decide to take your lawn mower to mow (もう) it all down.
When you do this, it destroys your lawn mower, because who thought it was a good idea to use a lawn mower on netting? Your dumb idea. C'mon!
